Description of incident: Three Rivers Community College may have suffered a security breach due to unauthorized access to its computer network. Data made vulnerable in the breach included names and Social Security numbers. Those affected would have been involved in the following programs during these years: 1997-2009: Participants in the Real Estate programs2004-2009: Participants in the Life Long Learners programs 2003-2006: Participants in the Patient Care Technicians programs2004-2006: Participants in the Certified Nursing Assistant programs2004-2005: Participants in the Electric Boat academic programs2007-2008: Participants in the Bridges to Health Care Careers programs2006-2008: Participants in the Photons for Educators programs2004-2009: Faculty or staff members of the Three Rivers Continuing Education office.
